author: Daniel S
comment: Stumbled upon this yesterday and love it so far!  Has a nice simple design but has all of the features I like.  Has lots of customization!   the notification mode in ambient mode is brilliant.  Great work!  A+ The only thing I would love to have would be some kind of animated background.. but I am NOT gonna get picky!  :)

author: Oscar Cusin
comment: Really like the watch face. But I have been noticing some pixel burn-in on my LG Watch Urbane so if you could add a feature so that the elements of the watch face (clock, complications etc) move around every so often to prevent pixel burn-in I will rate the app 5 stars! Thank you in advance and keep up the good work!  UPDATE: a reboot fixed it. I will rate the app 5 stars because it was not your fault and for the fast response! Keep up the good work! I might donate as well :)

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content: Could you please send an email with a picture of your watch and the complications you're using? The system moves the watchface around in ambient mode on oled displays, I have no control over that. If you don't see the watch face move every minute in ambient mode I would highly recommend to contact LG about it.

comment: Fantastic watch face. After hours of digging through the garbage in the Store, I was delighted to find this gem.  I usually prefer digital clocks to the analog ones, but this Digilog thing is quite unique and actually easy to read while saving the minute marks engraved on the bezel of my watch from being redundant. Moreover, it remains mostly unchanged in the ambient mode, which is something many other watch faces can't brag about.  It also offers personalization using the standard watch face tools and without all the overly-custom nonsense.

author: Tyler Rosengren
comment: It works the way my mind works.  I initially want to know the hour, and it gives me that without thinking.  Then I get to engage my brain a little bit a "figure out" the minutes.   Many times I only want to know roughly what hour it is during the day.  This allows me to know the general time at a quick glance, but also the minutes if I so choose to look and think a little more.  The complication are good if you want them.  Personally I just like the date.   Wishes? 1.) I wish the app complication would not be in color on the main screen but just greyscale (like the date)  2.) Options to change the size and font of the middle digit.  (neither of these is worth giving it less than 5 stars though, excellent job Seahorsepip !!!!!)

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content:
I'll add a tint option for the app/photo complication in the future.
Adding font options is tricky since I would have to embed each font and each font scales differently which causes things to misalign :/

author: Carmen Alvarez
comment: Would like the possibility to have two "large" complications.  Right now only the bottom area supports large complications.  Glad to have found a watch face supporting 2.0 complications though :)

author: Andrew Van Winkle
comment: This is a daily driver for me. However, I do have my own set of complaints. The ambient is kinda dim, with no way to make just the ambient brighter( and I know this can be done, as I have seen some crappy watch faces include this feature), and also I haven't found a way to make the battery complication look big like it does in the play store screenshots. However, apart from these things, this is one of the absolute best free watch faces, and one I would pay a premium for. Great work!!

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content: Just increase the "Accent opacity" for ambient mode to make things more visible. As for the big battery complication, set the right complication slot as battery and keep the bottom slot empty.

author: Liviu Semacovschi
comment: I love this watch face. It looks beautiful, it's quite customizable considering it's free, no ads anywhere (just a Donate button, which I'll most surely use soon). It's also the only one I found that properly displays the read/unread notification status icons (so you don't have to scroll up to see if or what notifications you have).  Thank you, developers.

author: Deeptanshu Basu
comment: Love this watch face. Might just be me, but how do you have the large complication?

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content: Set the right complication and leave the bottom complication empty.

author: Jeremy Soo
comment: Awesome premium and free elegant customisable watchface!  Hopefully more options come out, for example a full analogue face instead of just digilogue.

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content: Working on a full analogue face ^^

author: Erik Larkin
comment: Love this Minimalist Design and would love to give it 5 stars, HOWEVER, the watch face is always removed and replaced with the stock Huawei 2 Watch Face every single time I restart the watch. I checked all settings and can't seem to stop this from happening... Thoughts??

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content:
Does this happen to all watch faces or just this watch face? Please open the android wear app on your phone after the error occurs,tap "Report wearable bug" in the menu, send the report to seahorsepip@outlook.com.

I'll look into the bug report and contact you as soon as I have more information.

Edit 20-05-17: Still waiting for that report.

author: Andrew Dennis
comment: This is my daily driver, at last, aesthetics and simplicity ...just one thing, very recently the weather complication is 'sticking' at the last location it was..could be AW 2.0 update has broken something..

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content: Yes the last AW update broke it here too :(....

author: Daniel Millard
comment: Love the watch style, love the customizing options. But would love to have a full analog watch without the number on the middle and some more customazions on the tickers. Thanks for the great watch face

author: Sam Torrero
comment: Excelent watchface, design is very cool, it lets you set background images and alternate backgrounds, personalize colors, complications, notifications. Perfect

author: E Kirchman
comment: Love just about every bit of it. I do wish that I could make the font a big larger and change the thickness, especially on the center hour number for digilog.

author: Loukas Karampogias
comment: Absolutely fantastic!   The best and most complete selection of secondary indicators, elegantly simple yet practical in tenths of ways.   Well done.

author: Cory Wilson
comment: My favorite watch face so far and one of the few that has all the new Android 2.0 features. Highly recommend!

author: Donald Stoddert
comment: Love it! Up to 4 complications and customizable. All for free. Donated!

author: Rohith Miah
comment: Great minimal watchfacw, especially in digital mode, however it would be nice to have more space for complications

author: David Mancini
comment: Good watch face but no longer have option for 3 complications.  Only 1 widget.

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content: That happens on the Android Wear 1 version, if your watch runs Android Wear 2 then update the watch face from the playstore on the watch itself. Please send me an email first for issues before leaving a review.

author: Ever Vincent Soriquez
comment: Minimalistic that supports Wear 2 complications.

author: Tom Gilmartin
comment: Love this watch face simple enough to look good but customisable enough to be unique.

author: Harun Deen
comment: Perfect and by far the best watch face available on here! Great customisation!

author: Adam Pecoraro
comment: Great watch face that improves upon the default.
line

author: Hua Bo Qiang
comment: simple is best

author: Liviu-Daniel Stanciu
comment: simple and easy

author: Miro Costa
comment: Great watchface

author: Johnny Ortiz
comment: Looks great and is fairly customizable, love it!  Complications are shown during ambient mode however and I'm not a fan of  that :(

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content:
Edit: added in version 2.7
____________________________________________________

I'll add an option to disable complications during ambient mode.

If you have any other ideas/requests please send a mail to: seahorsepip[at]outlook.com

author: John Burke
comment: Very unique way of handling non-persistent Data Providers, I dig how it repositions things to avoid having a gap. Really cool!

author: IDLE 0095
comment: Like the look. Needs some options like progress rings for battery and other complications.

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content: The progress ring is available for the right complication which is automatically re-positioned to avoid having gaps.

author: Kelly DeCorso
comment: Love it!  I will try other watch faces but always come back to this one.  Best looking and just plain cool.

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content:
Long press the screen to open settings and tap "right complication" then tap "general" and then choose "watch battery".

Please don't use reviews for support questions, use the provided email instead. If you have any other issues or questions feel free to send me an email.

author: Ryan Clayton
comment: I'm liking this watch face very much.  Great design and 2.0!  Thanks!

author: Bader Aljishi
comment: Loving this on LG watch sport

author: Jurriaan Den Toonder
comment: I like the minimalistic yet very good looking design of this watchface. It is working well. Very readable and again, it looks very good!
title: Nice design!

author: Dariel Crespo
comment: Forgot i had this. Downloaded this watch face i think a month ago and it doesnt show up on my phone or watch.

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content: Please use the email address provided for tech support, reviews like these are considered spam.

author: Ronald Martin
comment: Really nice design. Great support, too. Looks great on my LG Urbane watch.

author: Omar Hamandi
comment: Extremely simple yet functional, it's also very beautiful!

author: Obinna Ojialor
comment: Great for amoled screens
title: Clean watch face

author: Matt Melvin
comment: Like the classic simplicity in design. Well executed controls.
title: Elegant

author: Jacques LABATUT
comment: Ne fonctionne pas sur SAMSUNG GALAXY ALPHA

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content:
That's not even an Android Wear watch, hell not even a smartwatch??

Reported for spam, please down vote these kind of reviews.
